[For Johnny, see Potato, in new phone book](http://www.guardian.co.uk/international/story/0,,1774784,00.html?gusrc=rss)
A spanish town publishes its own phone book, with residents listed by their nicknames. Imagine that – a community where everyone knows everybody, and all give each other nicknames. Can’t see that happeneing in many parts of the UK any more.
(tags: [community](http://del.icio.us/adders/community) [spain](http://del.icio.us/adders/spain) [publishing](http://del.icio.us/adders/publishing))
